>

> Columbia said:
> 
> 
> I can't see the images. Can you re-upload it?
> 

I uploaded them to Google Drive and forgot to set them for public viewing, now it is fixed ![:D](//s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/kerbal-forum-uploads/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2019-12-08T22:12:40Z" title="12/08/2019 10:12  PM" data-short="4 yr">December 8, 2019</time> by danilon62**

> 
> It's spelled "MOAR", not "MORE" ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Well, I can always change it, pencil FTW ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Whoa, nice. That's pretty well-done.

I'll just stand here with my stick figures ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
I like Smurf the best. Look at him, being in a dress and carrying a rocket.
"Space smurf" seems like a pretty close description for kerbals.
XD Space Smurf blue kerbals the sworn enimes of kerbals (i usually just doodle when im bored on a plane i made up a alien world and did some sketches of it)

> 
> 
> lajoswinkler said:
> 
> 
> I like Smurf the best. Look at him, being in a dress and carrying a rocket.
> 

It isn't meant to be a rocket, but yea, might aswell be a <abbr title="Solid fuel Rocket Booster">SRB</abbr> (Smurf Rocket Booster).
